channel.title: MS Error
channel.description: ok, I downloaded MoparScape v 3.2 and I can connect and log in, but shortly after (as in, not long enough to code in a ::pickup command) I am logged out and get the message "Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 600pics.com:1379" or "Exception! (2)" or (4). I have just downloaded the latest Java plugin and have Jre 09 (whatever is inbetween) instead of 08. Anyone know how to fix this?
